page.title: 07MR. McCONNELL'S FARM
page.content: My Dad Mr. William McConnell is a dairy farmer who lives in the townland of Drumgaw.Altogether he farms 92 acres 52 of which are used for grazing and the remaining 40 are used for silage.54 are in the Drumgaw area and 38 are in Ballymoran. {LIVESTOCK 65 Friesian cows 15 Bullocks 7 Friesian heifers 35 Calves 1 Limousin bull Although this is primarily a dairy farm some cattle are reared for beef. All farm work involves animal care and production of grass crops to feed them.On average{the farmer works 13 {hours per day}on six days of the week and on{Sunday 7 hours.}He can only have a few days holiday during which he must pay a neighbour to look after his stock. Much of his profit is invested in the farm.
